title: Overnight Brown Butter Waffles
description: Crispy-edged waffles with deep flavor thanks to brown butter and an overnight rise.
author: Camille Ajayi

steps.text: Whisk warm milk, sugar, and yeast in a large bowl; rest 5 minutes.
Stir in flour, salt, brown butter, eggs, and vanilla until smooth. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
In the morning, heat waffle iron. Stir batter to deflate slightly, then cook until deeply golden.
